title: Microsoft Edge is getting a built-in VPN
content:
A VPN, virtual private network, is a great way to instantly improve your online security, but it often comes with a cost and additional downloads. This week, Microsoft has announced that it will add a VPN directly to its Chromium-based Edge browser.

moreâ€¦

The post Microsoft Edge is getting a built-in VPN appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Microsoft Edge is getting ready to release a new VPN tool that was built with Cloudflare to improve your online security with one click.
